pkgmetadata.longdescription: Maximum Parsimony of Recombination to Infer Parental Genotypes // Infer parental genotypes based on low-coverage population sequencing data and thus can genotype mapping populations and construct ultra-high density linkage map in a parent- independent manner. Weibo Xie et al. (2010) doi:10.1073/pnas.1005931107.
